question: NK Trikha, who passed away recently, was associated with which field?
explanation: NK Trikha (82), the veteran journalist, has passed away at AIIMS in New Delhi on Janauary 15, 2018. Trikha had worked at the Times of India Group\'s Hindi newspaper \'Navbharat Times\' for a long time and was also the editor of its Lucknow edition. He also served as a member of the Press Council of India and he was twice president of the National Union of Journalists (India).
